objects.text:
• 925 Sterling Silver
• Authentic Rose Gold Finish
• 6 Month Warranty*

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 65 ratings.

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a soft and elegant jewelry-themed design with a radial gradient background transitioning from a gentle blush pink to a slightly deeper rose hue. Scattered angular light-pink sparkle elements subtly decorate the background, adding a delicate sense of luxury. The centerpiece is a vivid image of rose gold wreath stud earrings (“product_image”), visually prominent on the left-hand side.

The heading (“heading”) is a bold two-line text emphasizing the product in uppercase, using a modern serif font in a rosewood tone to catch attention. A smaller subheading text (“subheading”) above it in dark grey introduces the designer collection. Below the product image, three succinct bullet points (“description”) detail product materials and warranty, set in a clean sans-serif font.

Beneath this, the price (“price”) is showcased in a modern, geometric font using the same rosewood color as the heading, reinforcing the brand style. A contrasting dark slate rectangular call-to-action button (“cta_background”) contains centered white text (“cta”) prompting immediate engagement.

**Color Palette:**
- Blush Pink: `#FFF5F5`
- Soft Rose: `#FFE4E4`
- Accent Rose: `#B76E79` (used in heading and price)
- Text Grey: `#4A4A4A` (used in subheading, CTA background)
- White: `#FFFFFF` (CTA text)
- Soft Accent Pinks: `#FFD1D1` (used in decorative shapes)
product_color: The product image features a pair of elegant earrings with a luxurious, soft rose gold base (#F4A9A0), which dominates the structure and provides a warm, feminine appeal. The earrings are adorned with sparkling white gemstones (#FFFFFF), adding a classic brilliance that contrasts beautifully with the soft pink tones. Marquise-cut stones appear in a translucent icy silver (#E6E6E6), adding dimension and depth. The colors are blended artfully—rose gold outlines and clasps frame the gemstones, highlighting their shine while enhancing the overall delicate aesthetic. Ideal banner colors: Rose Gold (#F4A9A0), Diamond White (#FFFFFF), Icy Silver (#E6E6E6), and Blush Pink (#FAD4D0).
